replies.message: Glad you're enjoying the Fox stickers, Nikki. They're my favorite as well! - Kristen
Helo can you help me.i want to d0wnload this applicati0n.can you give me facebook

Instead of getting posts with information that may save lives, like from missingcases.com, I'm getting spammy posts from Facebook about fox stickers!  Facebook's posts, by the way, seem to always appear in my feed, while the posts of other pages I like don't.
stop hiding my posts from the newsfeed please it is for a good cause

There are spammy posts in between EVERY POST, EVERY DAY on my home page that I DON'T WANT TO SEE !!! I've asked you to change this before !!! Now it's BACK !!! :( !!!  I VERY MUCH WANT TO SEE ALL of the MISSINGCASES.COM posts !!! You LEAVE the SPAM stuff ON and TAKE OFF THE HELPFUL stuff !!! I WILL PUT THE STUFF ON MY PAGE THAT I WANT to SEE !!! PLEASE, PLEASE FIX THIS, A LOT of LIVES ARE NOW IN DANGER !!! THANK YOU SO MUCH !!!  :) !!!
this really that important?.....find someting else to do wtf?
